title: cndi-config
$comment: The root of the cndi config schema
description: A configuration file for CNDI that defines the hardware and software of your cluster

project_name.description: The name of the cndi project, should be unique in your personal ecosystem.

cndi_version.description: The version of cndi config api to use.

infrastructure.description: An object which defines the infrastructure resources CNDI should deploy.

cndi.description: An object which contains the resources CNDI should deploy, which are defined by the CNDI project.

self_signed.description:
Whether or not the certificate should be self-signed (insecure).
 Can only be true if "email" is not defined.

email.description:
The email address let's encrypt should attach to your certificates.
 Can only be used if "self_signed" is false or undefined.

open_ports.description: An array of ports to open on the cluster.

items.description: A port to open or close on the cluster.

number.description: The port number to open or close.

nodes.$comment: An array of CNDI cluster nodes to deploy.

items.description: An object which defines the properties of a new Kubernetes node for CNDI to deploy. At least one must be have the "role" property set to "leader".

name.description: The name of the node to deploy.

kind.description: The type of node to deploy.

volume_size.description: The amount of disk to allocate to the node in G.

oneOf.description: The amount of disk to allocate to the node.
The amount of disk to allocate to the node in G.
The amount of memory to allocate to the node.
The amount of memory to allocate to the node in G.

cluster_manifests.description: An object which contains all manifests that CNDI should apply to your cluster.

^[a-z0-9]+(?:-[a-z0-9]+)*$.description: An object which represents a single manifest CNDI should apply to your cluster.

kind.description: The kind of Kubernetes resource to deploy.

apiVersion.description: The API version of the Kubernetes resource to deploy.

metadata.description: The metadata of the Kubernetes resource to deploy.

name.description: The name of the Kubernetes resource to deploy.

spec.description: The spec of the Kubernetes resource to deploy.

applications.description: An object that defines how to generate an ArgoCD Application CRD.

targetRevision.description: The version or revision of the Helm Chart to deploy.

repoURL.description: The URL of the git-hosted Helm Chart or Helm repository to deploy.

destinationNamespace.description: The namespace in your CNDI Kubernetes cluster to deploy the Helm Chart to.

chart.description: The name of the Helm Chart to deploy.

path.description: The path to the Helm Chart from the root of the git-hosted repository.
